definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: Fasting the day of 'Ashura' ( Muharram 10) is an expiation for the year preceding it.
sentences.chinese: 阿舒拉日齋戒一天可以贖去過去一年的罪過。

sentences.english: The son that she brought forth was named Tammuz.
sentences.chinese: 她帶前來的兒子被命名爲齋戒。

sentences.english: Eid-al-Fitr marks the end of Muslim fasting month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 開齋節標示著穆斯林齋戒月的結束。

sentences.english: Fasting cleans and detoxifies our body.
sentences.chinese: 齋戒能潔淨我們的身體並幫助排毒。

sentences.english: When you fast, work on specific goals.
sentences.chinese: 當你齋戒的時候，尋找一個特定的目標。

sentences.english: Once your fast is over, re-think your media intake.
sentences.chinese: 當你的媒體齋戒結束，重新考慮你的媒體攝取量。

sentences.english: Permitted to you, on the night of the fasts, is the approach to your wives.
sentences.chinese: 齋戒的夜間，準你們和妻室交接。

sentences.english: Tammuz, like his supposed father, became a hunter.
sentences.chinese: 齋戒像他的哎唷父親，成爲一個獵人。

sentences.english: We fast also to honor the Revelation of the Qur'an in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 我們齋戒同樣尊重在這個吉慶月份中古蘭經的降世。

sentences.english: The day came when Tammuz was killed by a wild pig.
sentences.chinese: 當日字來到時，齋戒被一頭野豬所殺。

sentences.english: The Medicine Master Sutra mentions about the benefits of learning and practicing the eight precepts.
sentences.chinese: 藥師經指示受持八關齋戒的利益。

sentences.english: The Koran recommends fasting as a penance before pilgrimages.
sentences.chinese: 《古蘭經》勸告人們在朝聖前齋戒，以作爲一種補贖。

sentences.english: My knees have become weak from fasting, my body is wasted of its substance.
sentences.chinese: 我的雙膝因齋戒而痠軟，我的肉體已經消瘦不堪。

sentences.english: For this reason, the history of salvation is replete with occasions that invite fasting.
sentences.chinese: 因此之故，救恩史中不乏要求我們齋戒的場合。

definition: (Buddhism) to initiate sb for monkhood or nunhood
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
Feast of All Souls (fifteenth day of seventh lunar month) (Buddhism)
to pass on the light of Buddha
Yanshou county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang/to extend life
work or plans left as a legacy/the views of the departed/posthumous orders or teachings
restrain yourself and return to the rites (idiom, from Analects); to subdue self and observe proprieties/(any number of possible translations)
